attributes.action: Sort out his company The Royal Mail from Extiniction, IT needs to evolve or die?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Has the goverment is the sole shareholder and only owner of the Royal Mail. Is it not its Responsibility to make sure the Royal Mail IS profitable, has Quality service to business and resdiential customers alike and make sure its employees i.e. frontline staff get fair pension and wages? 

Bottom line CWU and Alan Leighton, and Adam Crozier will never agree. Strikes are hurting royal mail and other business's has the competition is not direct competition since we the post person delvier the final mile.

p.s. the way things are going going royal mail will end up like the coal miners of late EX Prime Minister Thacthers years extinict. 

Who else agrees the goverment is responsible and therefor its appropriate for it to take direct action resolve the issues involed with the industrial dispute between CWU and Adam Crozier/Alan Leighton

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
